title: Interdiscount
description: Interdiscount is the leading omnichannel retailer for electronic goods in Switzerland and part of the coop group. I played a key role in setting up and migrating a legacy React project to a state-of-the-art Next.js monorepo, incorporating support for React server components.

title: One X Tech
description: One X Tech is a business technology partner, focused on building technological innovations for leading enterprises.

title: diva-e
description: At diva-e, a leading software development service provider, I focused on crafting and enhancing digital experiences to elevate customer interactions. My role primarily involved developing and refining front-end code bases, while also leveraging my back-end expertise. I gained extensive experience working in agile teams and successfully led projects and conducted technical interviews.

title: Malai Herbal
description: Malai Herbal, a beauty business specializing in organic hair products, entrusted me with developing their e-commerce platform from the ground up. I implemented a serverless architecture to ensure scalability and optimized performance. The project involved creating a robust online store complete with comprehensive product administration capabilities.

title: Freelancer
description: In the final year of my Bachelor's program, I leveraged my self-taught engineering skills as a freelancer. My projects ranged from small bug fixes and developing web scrapers to building a B2C e-commerce platform.

title: Win-Win Asia
description: Win-Win Asia is an international tour operator and destination management agency. During my tenure, I primarily managed staff and ensured efficient company operations. Given the seasonal nature of the business, I also had the opportunity to extend and optimize the company's WordPress websites and internal applications.
